00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup ADC_Examples ADC
00038   * @{
00039   */

00042   * @{

00044 
00045 
00046 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void ADC_Configuration(void);
00048 void TM_Configuration(void);
00049 
00050 void ADC_MainRoutine(void);
00051 
00052 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 u32 gADC_Result[3];
00054 vu32 gADC_CycleEndOfConversion;
00055 
00056 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00058   * @brief  Main program.
00059   * @retval None
00060   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00061 int main(void)
00062 {
00063   RETARGET_Configuration();
00064 
00065   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00066   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00067   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED3);
00068 
00069   ADC_Configuration();
00070 
00071   TM_Configuration();
00072 
00073   ADC_Cmd(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, ENABLE);
00074 
00075   /* Enable TM which will trigger ADC start of conversion periodically                                      */
00076   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, ENABLE);
00077 
00078   while (1)
00079   {
00080     ADC_MainRoutine();
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00085   * @brief  ADC main routine.
00086   * @retval None
00087   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00088 void ADC_MainRoutine(void)
00089 {
00090   if (gADC_CycleEndOfConversion)
00091   {
00092     printf("ADC Result Seq0:%4u Seq1:%4u Seq2:%4u\r\n", gADC_Result[0], gADC_Result[1], gADC_Result[2]);
00093     gADC_CycleEndOfConversion = FALSE;
00094   }
00095 }
00096 
00097 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00098   * @brief  ADC configuration.
00099   * @retval None
00100   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00101 void ADC_Configuration(void)
00102 {
00103   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00104     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00105     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00106     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_ADC_IPN = 1;
00107     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00108   }
00109 
00110   /* Configure AFIO mode as ADC function                                                                    */
00111   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_VR_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_VR_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_ADC_AFIO_MODE);
00112   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_AD2_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_AD2_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_ADC_AFIO_MODE);
00113   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_AD3_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_AD3_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_ADC_AFIO_MODE);
00114 
00115   { /* ADC related settings                                                                                 */
00116     /* CK_ADC frequency is set to (CK_AHB / 64)                                                             */
00117     CKCU_SetADCnPrescaler(HTCFG_ADC_CKCU_ADCPRE, CKCU_ADCPRE_DIV64);
00118 
00119     /* One Shot mode, sequence length = 3                                                                   */
00120     ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, ONE_SHOT_MODE, 3, 0);
00121 
00122     /* ADC conversion time = (Sampling time + Latency) / CK_ADC = (1.5 + ADST + 12.5) / CK_ADC              */
00123     /* Set ADST = 36, sampling time = 1.5 + ADST                                                            */
00124     #if (LIBCFG_ADC_SAMPLE_TIME_BY_CH)
00125       // The sampling time is set by the last parameter of the function "ADC_RegularChannelConfig()".
00126     #else
00127     ADC_SamplingTimeConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, 36);
00128     #endif
00129 
00130     /* Set ADC conversion sequence as channel n                                                             */
00131     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_VR_ADC_CH, 0, 36);
00132     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_AD2_ADC_CH, 1, 36);
00133     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_AD3_ADC_CH, 2, 36);
00134 
00135     /* Set GPTM0 CH3O as ADC trigger source                                                                 */
00136     ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_ADC_TRIG_TM_CH3O);
00137   }
00138 
00139   /* Enable ADC single/cycle end of conversion interrupt                                                    */
00140   ADC_IntConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, ADC_INT_SINGLE_EOC | ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC, ENABLE);
00141 
00142   /* Enable the ADC interrupts                                                                              */
00143   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_ADC_IRQn);
00144 }
00145 
00146 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00147   * @brief  TM configuration.
00148   * @retval None
00149   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00150 void TM_Configuration(void)
00151 {
00152   /* Configure GPTM0 channel 3 as PWM output mode used to trigger ADC start of conversion every 1 second    */
00153 
00154   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00155     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00156     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_PWM_TM_IPN = 1;
00157     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00158   }
00159 
00160   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00161 
00162     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00163        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00164        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00165     */
00166     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00167 
00168     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = (SystemCoreClock / 40000) - 1; // GPTM Clock is 40K
00169     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = 40000 - 1;
00170     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00171     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00172     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00173     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00174   }
00175 
00176   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00177 
00178     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00179        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00180        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00181     */
00182     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00183     OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_3;
00184     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM2;
00185     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00186     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00187     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00188     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00189     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00190     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00191     OutInit.Compare = 20000 - 1;
00192     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00193     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, &OutInit);
00194   }
00195 
00196   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, TM_INT_CH3CC, ENABLE);
00197   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_PWM_IRQn);
00198 }

00201 /*********************************************************************************************************//**

00203   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00204   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00205   * @retval None
00206   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00207 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00208 {
00209   /*
00210      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00211      Debug message can be added here.
00212      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00213   */
00214 
00215   while (1)
00216   {
00217   }
00218 }
